channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Aid workers are doubtful of a U.S.-built pier near Gaza; RFK Jr.'s dead brain worm
item.description: A pier off Gaza for aid is expected to be installed soon, but aid workers have questions. RFK Jr. says doctors found a dead worm in his brain. The WHO says he's not alone.
item.content:encoded: A pier off Gaza for aid is expected to be installed soon, but aid workers have questions. RFK Jr. says doctors found a dead worm in his brain. The WHO says he's not alone.
item.dc:creator: Suzanne Nuyen

item.title: Why is a teen Trump in the news? Find out in the quiz
item.description: This week began with the Met Gala, which brought much-needed pageantry to the everyday lives of mortals. There was also real estate, dating apps, resignations and more.
item.content:encoded: This week began with the Met Gala, which brought much-needed pageantry to the everyday lives of mortals. There was also real estate, dating apps, resignations and more.
item.dc:creator: Holly J. Morris

item.title: California says restaurants must bake all of their add-on fees into menu prices
item.description: Service charges; resort fees; "surcharge" add-ons: A new state law requiring price transparency is set to take effect in July. Until now, no one knew how it would apply to restaurants.
item.content:encoded: Service charges; resort fees; "surcharge" add-ons: A new state law requiring price transparency is set to take effect in July. Until now, no one knew how it would apply to restaurants.
item.dc:creator: Bill Chappell

item.title: WNBA teams will travel on chartered flights for the next 2 seasons, the league says
item.description: Before, teams could travel on chartered flights during the postseason and for back-to-back games in the regular season. Many players said the change will make recovery easier and make them feel safer.
item.content:encoded:
Before, teams could travel on chartered flights during the postseason and for back-to-back games in the regular season. Many players said the change will make recovery easier and make them feel safer.

(Image credit: John Locher)
item.dc:creator: Ayana Archie

item.title: Maui community mobilizes to protect water quality from runoff after Lahaina fires
item.description: The debris from Lahaina's fire contains toxic chemicals and sits right next to a coral reef. So the community is collaborating with scientists to track water quality.
item.content:encoded:
The debris from Lahaina's fire contains toxic chemicals and sits right next to a coral reef. So the community is collaborating with scientists to track water quality.

(Image credit: Ryan Kellman)
item.dc:creator: Lauren Sommer

item.title: A flyer in her name told migrants to vote for Biden. But she says she didn't write it
item.description: Viral images of the flyer were filmed in portable toilets of a migrant camp in Mexico, and they energized members of Congress. But NPR's reporting suggests the flyer is not what it purports to be.
item.content:encoded: Viral images of the flyer were filmed in portable toilets of a migrant camp in Mexico, and they energized members of Congress. But NPR's reporting suggests the flyer is not what it purports to be.
item.dc:creator: Jude Joffe-Block

item.title: Is Biden's border plan working? Here's how the top immigration official says it is
item.description: Homeland Security Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas sat with Morning Edition to discuss the president's approach to migrant arrivals and where he feels the strategy has worked.
item.content:encoded: Homeland Security Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas sat with Morning Edition to discuss the president's approach to migrant arrivals and where he feels the strategy has worked.
item.dc:creator: Obed Manuel

item.title: 2 skiers killed after being caught in Utah avalanche, sheriff says
item.description: Two skiers were killed and one was rescued after they were buried in an avalanche in the mountains outside of Salt Lake City that occurred after several days of spring snowstorms, authorities said.
item.content:encoded:
Two skiers were killed and one was rescued after they were buried in an avalanche in the mountains outside of Salt Lake City that occurred after several days of spring snowstorms, authorities said.

(Image credit: Rick Bowmer)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Senate passes FAA reauthorization bill, sending legislation to the House
item.description: The Senate passed a bill designed to improve safety and customer service for air travelers, a day before the law governing the Federal Aviation Administration expires.
item.content:encoded:
The Senate passed a bill designed to improve safety and customer service for air travelers, a day before the law governing the Federal Aviation Administration expires.

(Image credit: J. Scott Applewhite)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Eurovision 2024: Here are the songs with the best shot at glory
item.description: Another year, another glitter-filled spectacle known as the Eurovision Song Contest. The Grand Final airs Saturday at 3:00 p.m. ET on Peacock in the United States.
item.content:encoded:
Another year, another glitter-filled spectacle known as the Eurovision Song Contest. The Grand Final airs Saturday at 3:00 p.m. ET on Peacock in the United States.

(Image credit: Jessica Gow)
item.dc:creator: Glen Weldon
